document_data.name: Bill
document_data.mainbody:
'''Bill''' was a [[dwarf|dwarvish]] pirate from the isle of [[Brynnlaw]] in the [[Sea of Swords]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]]. {{quote|''Aye, mate, bend yer ear fer a secon'... Whaddaya call a fish wit' no eyes?
Fssshhh! Har, har, har, ye're a landlubber if e'er I saw one, mate!''|Pirate Bill}}
document_data.Description: Bill was a male dwarf with dark hair and a horned [[helmet]]. He wore [[armor]] and carried a large [[shield]], armed with a simple blade.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1369}}, Bill sailed the ''[[Bleedin' Mary]]'' and could be found drinking in the [[Vulgar Monkey]] dock-side tavern alongside the rest of the ship's crew. He cheerily made terrible sea-related puns and made fun of landlubbers.
